column2: Coca-Cola European Partners Plc engages in the distribution and sale of ready-to-drink beverages. The company is headquartered in Uxbridge, Middlesex and currently employs 23,310 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in making, selling and distributing a range of non-alcoholic ready-to-drink beverages. The firm serves consumers across Western Europe, including Andorra, Belgium, continental France, Germany, Great Britain, Iceland, Luxembourg, Monaco, the Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain and Sweden. Its brands include Coca-Cola, Diet Coke/Coca-Cola Light, Coke Zero, Coca-Cola Life, Fanta and Sprite. The Companyâ€™s portfolio offerings includes energy drinks, waters, juices, sports drinks and ready-to-drink teas.
